info: Rating, 5 stars,  · 1 week ago,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment:
Incredible place!
Loved the high ceilings, the lawn and just the overall energy of the place (+the ride to get there)
The host was super responsive and helpful all throughout and can’t wait to escape the city and go here again!

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed with a pet
rating_comment: TupTap is a piece of paradise, just a short drive from Dhaka. I spent one night with my dog, and we especially like the surrounding area (open fields), which was good for walks, and the private garden with tomatoes and strawberries. Shakhawath was very responsive and provided excellent advice regarding directions and where to eat. I am looking forward to my next stay, which I have already booked for two nights next month! Thank you!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment:
Another pleasant experience.
It was my 2nd time in this place and it was great.
Highly recommend who wants to escape the crowd and noise.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment: Staying at this place was an absolute delight! Suitable for two. It cosy one-bed cottage. 45-minute to 1-hour drive from new Dhaka. Very accommodating host. The peacefulness of the place made it a perfect weekend getaway. It felt like a cosy home away from home, surrounded by beautiful plants. Highly recommend.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment:
It was just perfect!!!
Nice garden and farming.
Some different types of birds were present for the whole time like Magpie-Robin, Black Drongo and Common Bulbul.
Felt like my village home where noise doesn’t exist.
It was a pleasant experience overall.
The host was very cooperative and provided some critical information upfront about restaurants and that helped to adjust my trip plan.
Will be visiting soon.
Highly recommended for those who want to escape the noise and enjoy calmness.
